mapper.select: select count(*) from take_course tc join course c on tc.course_id = c.id join member m on tc.user_id = m.user_id where 1 = 1 and c.id = #{searchCourseId}

select tc.*, c.subject, m.user_name, m.phone from take_course tc join course c on tc.course_id = c.id join member m on tc.user_id = m.user_id where 1 = 1 and c.id = #{searchCourseId} order by reg_dt desc limit #{pageStart}, #{pageEnd}
select tc.*, c.subject from take_course tc join course c on tc.course_id = c.id where tc.user_id = #{userId} order by reg_dt desc
